messages.msg: Welcome to our site! If you are looking for prayer or someone to chat with, reply to this message or email us at prayer@fightlust.com
I want to reclaim my sexuality from Satan my sexuality has been tainted through sexual sin my body is defiled my marriage has been hurt by sexual sin

I'm really sorry to hear that you're feeling this way. It's important to know that you're not alone in this struggle. We can offer guidance and prayer to help you reclaim your sexuality and find healing. Would you like to share a specific prayer request or talk more about how you're feeling?

Absolutely! Here’s a prayer you can use:

"Dear Lord, I come before You seeking healing and restoration. I ask for Your forgiveness for the sexual sins that have tainted my life and my marriage. Please cleanse my heart and mind, and help me reclaim my sexuality in a way that honors You. Strengthen my resolve to resist temptation and guide me towards a path of purity. I trust in Your love and grace to heal my wounds and restore my marriage. In Jesus' name, Amen."

If you have any specific requests or areas you'd like to focus on in prayer, feel free to share!
I want my life marriage will body sexuality destiny soul emotions mind heart and desires taken back from satan

I understand how deeply you want to reclaim every aspect of your life. Here’s a prayer you can use to address those areas:

"Heavenly Father, I come before You today to reclaim my life, my marriage, my body, my sexuality, my destiny, my soul, my emotions, my mind, my heart, and my desires from the grip of Satan. I renounce any strongholds that have been established in my life and ask for Your divine intervention. Please restore me completely and fill me with Your Holy Spirit. Help me to walk in Your truth and to live a life that reflects Your love and purity. I trust in Your power to heal and transform me. In Jesus' name, Amen."

If you need further support or specific prayers for any of these areas, just let me know!

Absolutely, let's include your eyes in the prayer as well. Here’s an updated prayer:

"Heavenly Father, I come before You today to reclaim my life, my marriage, my body, my sexuality, my destiny, my soul, my emotions, my mind, my heart, my desires, and my eyes from the grip of Satan. I renounce any strongholds that have been established in my life and ask for Your divine intervention. Please restore me completely and help my eyes to see only what is pure and pleasing to You. Fill me with Your Holy Spirit and guide me to walk in Your truth. I trust in Your power to heal and transform me. In Jesus' name, Amen."

If there's anything else you'd like to add or focus on, feel free to share!
I just feel that their is separation between me and God because of my sexual sins I need intercessor praying for me I feel a sense of hopelessness

I'm really sorry to hear that you're feeling this way. It's important to know that you're not alone in this journey, and there is hope for healing and restoration. 

We can certainly pray for intercession on your behalf. Here’s a prayer you can use:

"Heavenly Father, I come to You feeling the weight of my sins and the separation it has caused between us. I ask for Your forgiveness and for the cleansing of my heart and mind. Please send intercessors to pray for me and support me in this time of need. Help me to feel Your presence and love, and remind me that there is hope in You. I trust in Your grace and mercy to restore our relationship. In Jesus' name, Amen."

If you would like to share a specific prayer request or need further support, please let me know. We're here to help you through this.

Absolutely! We're here to support you with prayers. If you have any specific areas you'd like us to focus on in prayer, please feel free to share. Otherwise, here's a general prayer for healing and restoration:

"Heavenly Father, I lift up this individual to You. I ask for Your healing touch in their life, especially in the areas affected by past sexual sins. Please grant them strength, hope, and a renewed sense of purpose. Surround them with Your love and guide them on their journey towards purity and freedom in Christ. May they feel Your presence and know that they are never alone. In Jesus' name, Amen."

If there's anything else you need or if you'd like to share more, I'm here for you!
I want to renounce Satan and all the ways he has exploited my heart mind will sexuality marriage emotions and desires and trying to accomplish his will I repent before God for allowing it

That's a powerful step towards healing and restoration. Here’s a prayer you can use to renounce those influences and seek God's forgiveness:

"Heavenly Father, I come before You today to renounce Satan and all the ways he has exploited my heart, mind, will, sexuality, marriage, emotions, and desires. I repent for allowing these influences to take hold in my life. I ask for Your forgiveness and cleansing from all unrighteousness. In the name of Jesus Christ, I break all ties with the enemy and declare that I am free from his grasp. Fill me with Your Holy Spirit and guide me in walking in purity and righteousness. Thank You for Your grace and love. Amen."

If you need further support or guidance, feel free to reach out!
